Author: anonnnn_5
Text: That's why I stopped restricting, after all. I couldn't concentrate, my grades got bad, I always felt so nauseous, sleepy and cold. I fainted a couple of times. When people looked at my face, they could tell I have no energy at all judging by my paleness and dark circles. Oh, and the feelings of insane hunger pain at night. Sometimes I cried myself to sleep. It was pointless existence, not life.  Yes, I'm not that skinny compared to how I used to be. But I'm happy. Your weight should never determine your happiness. I really wish that everyone who'll read this message will recover and be healthy. That's the most important thing ♥️
